document_data.caption: Rest in peace.
document_data.name: Sacred Urn
document_data.mainbody:
A '''sacred urn''' was a holy vessel used in the [[Utter East]] during the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

When carried by a creature such as a [[basal golem]] who was subsequently slain, their essence was saved and transported back to their controlling [[bloodforge]] mage in the form of [[mana]].
